harvest_log_file: path to desired log file for harvester
verbose: bool on whether verbose output is desired
cutoff: int stating how many results to process, remove to process all
folder_id: unique id or uuid for the DiMu starting folder
mapping_log_file: path to desired log file for the mapping process
wiki_mapping_root: root page on Wikimedia Commons of which all mapping tables are subpages
default_intro_text: Default text at top of mapping table. With {key} being the mapping table type
